info.title: API de Sincronização Enjoy
info.description: Esta API tem como objetivo fornecer um serviço para a disponibilização de informações, permitindo que nossos integradores estejam sincronizados com a base de dados da Enjoy. A API segue o padrão REST, possibilitando a manipulação de clientes, produtos e pedidos na loja virtual. Atualmente, estão disponíveis as APIs: Clientes, Pedidos e Produtos.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort field (e.g., id, name, parent_id, created_at, updated_at)

get.summary: Get information about a specific category

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort field (e.g., id, name, code, created_at, updated_at)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip a certain number of results (pagination)

get.description: Retrieves color information based on the provided ID.

message.example: There is no data for the given code.
The :id parameter must be of integer type.

put.description: Updates color information based on the provided ID.

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.

delete.description: Deletes a color based on the provided ID.

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.
The :id parameter must be of integer type.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of coupons

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort field (e.g., id, name, type, code, discount, discount_type, start_date, end_date, created_at, updated_at)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of results per page

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip a specific number of results

get.summary: Get details of a specific coupon

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the coupon to retrieve details from

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.
The :id parameter must be of integer type.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the coupon to be updated

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.

code: The code field must be a string.
details: The details field must be an array.
discount: The discount field must be a decimal with 2 digits.
discount_type: The discount type field must be either 'amount' or 'percent'.
end_date: The end date field must be in the format 'Y-m-d' and after or equal to start date.
start_date: The start date field must be in the format 'Y-m-d' and after or equal to current date.
type: The type field must be either 'cart_base' or 'product_base'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the coupon to be deleted

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.
The :id parameter must be of integer type.

get.summary: Get products associated with a specific coupon

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the coupon to retrieve products from

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.
The :id parameter must be of integer type.

get.description: Retrieve a list of customers with sorting, paging, and filtering options.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort orders by a specific field

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve per page

200.description: Successful response with a list of customers

post.description: Creates a new user and associates addresses with it.

cpf.description: User password. If not provided, it will be generated from the first six digits of the CPF.

default_address.description: Indicates whether it is the default address (true) or not (false).

message.example: Required fields are missing or incorrect.
There is already a record with the given email.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to retrieve

message.example: Não há dados para o ID fornecido.
O parâmetro :id deve ser do tipo inteiro.

put.description: Updates a user and associated addresses.

default_address.description: Indicates whether it is the default address (true) or not (false).
